column2: A portable computer that is suitable for use while traveling.
A mobile phone that performs many of the functions of a computer, typically having a touchscreen interface, Internet access, and an operating system capable of running downloaded apps.
A mobile device larger than a smartphone and smaller than a laptop, typically having a touchscreen interface and sometimes using a stylus.
A personal computer designed to be used at a single location, typically consisting of a monitor, keyboard, and processing unit.
A device that prints text or illustrations on paper.
A device that scans documents or images and converts them into digital files.
A device that forwards data packets between computer networks.
A device that connects devices together on a computer network by using packet switching to forward data to the destination device.
A computer or software system that provides services to other computers or clients in a network.
A device used to store data, such as a hard drive, solid-state drive, or USB flash drive.
